## GDP

```{r}
finaldata |>
  ggplot(aes(x = GDP)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30) +
  scale_x_log10()
  labs(y = "Number of Observations", x = "GDP") + 
  theme_bw()
```

GDP is normally distributed.
